<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/servers/{server}/power"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Send a power action to a server.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"server","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The server UUID","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"signal":{"type":"string","enum":["start","stop","restart","kill"]}},"required":["signal"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
